CrazyCopter.entity

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • CrazyCopter.core.CoreObject
      • CrazyCopter.entity.Block

  • public class Block
extends CoreObject
    Block class used to make a boundary at the bottom of the screen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block(int x,
             int y,
             int id,
             Texture texture)
        Parameterized constructor
        Parameters:
        x - integer, top left corner of block in x-axis
        y - integer, top left corner of block in y-axis
        id - ID used to differentiate from enemies and the player in collision detection
        texture - image to represent block

      • Block

        Parameterized alternative constructor
        Parameters:
        x - integer, top left corner of block in x-axis
        y - integer, top left corner of block in y-axis
        id - ID used to differentiate from enemies and the player in collision detection
        width - width of block
        height - height of block
        texture - image to represent block
